I am trying to delete my yahoo user id of "dph_of_rules" due to the 
continuing amount of spam being received.

I already have a yahoo user id of "alternate_dph", which I am 
gradually switching over to.  That email address is already subscribed 
to both gladiator lists.  Meanwhile, all my email going to 
"dph_of_rules@..." is being forwarded to another email account. 

The only thing I am waiting for before deleting my old user id of 
"dph_of_rules" is the group owner, Seth Mitchell, to make 
"alternate_dph" a moderator of this group or give "dph_of_rules" the 
power to make more moderators.  If I delete the yahoo user id of 
"dph_of_rules", this group will effectively have no moderator.
